com.magicbinder.harmony.widget

Class ProgressImageLoaderListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magicbinder.harmony.widget.ProgressImageLoaderListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.assist.ImageLoadingListener

    public class ProgressImageLoaderListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.assist.ImageLoadingListener
    This listener is used in conjonction with the Universal Android Image Loader library. It display a neat undefined progress bar when your image is loading. (Don't use it in list adapters. )
